name: Can you beat this game?!?!??!
description:
Welcome the this game where i think you will never beat it.

This is a game where you have to get to the end

When you do reach the end... it will load your prizes like a $20 amazon gift card. So the first person who beats it get the amazon code. It will take like 10 mins to load. Maybe shorter if you have good wi-fi!!!

Move  by using your mouse to get around
